verbs.description: [ARG0: ansonia educators] [V: rally] [ARG2: against city call for return of 600 000] [ARG1: the ongoing budgetary battle between the city and the school district pending in court] has created unmanageable classrooms required teachers to learn new grade curriculums and stressed several people out and the stress has already claimed two victims matt hough president of the ansonia federation of teachers said a newly hired middle school teacher quit for medical reasons just weeks after her first day on the job and a second teacher from the same school is out on medical leave both he and other teachers said they fear that number will increase as the year wears on board of education middle school ansonia clock company lisa delgrego ansonia federation of teachers connecticut president ansonia high school ansonia connecticut ansonia new haven bridgeport connecticut bridgeport matt hough state board of education nicole dlugas mayor david cassetti 600 000
